thread.title: Senior Wellness Director - Tampa - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Senior Wellness Director - Tampa - Sports and Fitness

title: Senior Wellness Director - Tampa - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: Serving a membership base of over 5,000 households, the Sr. Wellness Director will be accountable for all member connection and retention initiatives relative to the wellness center and related programming. The Sr. Wellness Director will have a proven track record and passion for exercise, nutrition, healthy living and helping others live a healthier lifestyle. Additional skills in developing small groups, personal training, group exercise,   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
